[b][color=#ffffff]New Group Owner Control Panel[/color][/b]
[b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] has announced a new panel for group owners to alter the passwords of their subforums as well as add and remove group leaders at their discretion.

Credits were given to [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2015410][b]MeshCollider[/b][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999ff][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url] for their work on the new feature. 

A screenshot was generously provided of the panel:
[spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/Qlna6h4.png[/img][/spoiler]

Group owners can access the new control panel here: https://hackforums.net/groupcp.php
[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5806192]>>thread[/url][/size]


[b][color=#ffffff]Bye, Felicia! Three Awards to be Removed[/color][/b]
Award collectors beware! [b][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/url][/b] has recently announced that he will be removing the awards; ZECret, Stratisphere and XEMplary, at the end of March. With plans to replace these cryptocurrency specific awards with others such as Cardano -- this month represents the last month these awards will ever be available.

Awards: [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/zcash.png[/img] (ZECret) [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/stratis.png[/img] (Stratisphere) [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/nem.png[/img] XEMplary

Awards can be purchased by navigating to this page: https://hackforums.net/buyawards.php
[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5806196]>>thread[/url][/size]


[b][color=#ffffff]Gaming Tab Face Lift[/color][/b]
Those who frequent with gaming subforum will soon find a series of organizational changes and improvements to the previous layout. A few of the changes are as follows:
[list]
[*]Deleted SuperCell Games and moved into Mobile and Tablet Gaming.
[*]Deleted Pokemon Go forum and moved into Mobile and Tablet Gaming. A thread prefix was added for Pokemon Go.
[*]Deleted the Xbox Live Membership Codes forum which was closed and moved all threads to the main Xbox forum.
[*]Deleted the RGH/JTAG forum and moved all threads to main Xbox forum. A thread prefix for RGH/JTAG was added.

..and more.

A full list of changes can be found [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5806293&pid=56758403#pid56758403]here[/url].
[/list]
[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5806293]>>thread[/url][/size]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Tattooed Mummies Discovered![/color][/b] 
Yes, you have read correctly. The earliest figural tattoos were discovered on mummies over 5,000 years old. These two mummies, which are being held at the British Museum, possess the oldest ink we have seen. The researchers were able to distinguish the shapes by utilizing infrared technology. The first tattoo, seen on the upper arm of a male mummy, is a wild bull and a sheep. The second, seen on the upper arm and shoulder of a female mummy, is an S-shaped motif. The process used to identify these markings is summed up nicely by Daniel Antoine, Curator of Physical Anthropology "The use of the latest scientific methods, including CT scanning, radiocarbon dating, and infrared imaging, has transformed our understanding of the Gebelein mummies. Only now we are gaining new insights into the lives of these remarkably preserved individuals. Incredibly, at over 5,000 years of age, they push back the evidence for tattooing in Africa by a millennium."[i][size=x-small][url=https://blog.britishmuseum.org/worlds-earliest-figural-tattoos-discovered-on-5000-year-old-mummies/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Areas on Mars Suitable for Plant Life Identified[/color][/b] 
Looking into the future, researchers from Wageningen University have identified the most suitable areas to cultivate plant life on Mars. They are looking into this to aid an inevitable human colony on Mars.  According to the researchers, the vegetation will still need to be grown indoors, but the mapped areas will provide the best possible nutrients. The areas also take into account the number of natural resources surrounding them that can be utilized such as regolith and ice. It seems like we are forever pushing towards making humanity a multi-planet species. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.wur.nl/en/newsarticle/The-ideal-settlement-site-on-Mars-hotspots-if-you-asked-a-crop.htm]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/9ofBPAL.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Rainbow Six Siege to Launch New Ban System to Combat Racial and Homophobic Slurs[/color][/b] 
If you are one to be toxic in online video games, more specifically, Rainbow Six Siege, then you may want to re-think your vocabulary.  Using racial or homophobic slurs may lead you toward the path to a permanent ban from the game. Depending on what you say, you can face a two day, seven days, or even a 15-day ban. Ubisoft is bumping up their systems by having a speech identity system that will monitor and log any hateful speech comments. Although an alternative route would be to report a user, there will be no need to with this system in place. Ubisoft understands that people can trash talk and may get out of hand so using a few curse words will not lead to a ban. If you plan on dropping racial or homophobic slurs, on the other hand, you have a whole different train coming your way. Do you think other competitive games should implement this system? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/rainbow-six-siege-to-launch-new-ban-system-to-combat-racial-and-homophobic-slurs/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]No More PS3 or PS Vita Games on PS Plus From March 2019[/color][/b] 
If you love that nostalgic feeling of being able to play old games from the PS3 or PS Vista on your PS4, then sadly that will be coming to an end. Next year, 2019, Sony will be removing only the PS3 and PS Vista games from the membership benefits of having PS+. If these games do not interest you then you probably will not care. Although these are being removed, free PS4 games that you receive monthly will not be removed. You will still have the chance to obtain two free PS4 games with the PS+ membership. If you have downloaded any games using the PS+ membership service you will be able to keep them. If you see any games that may interest you then you better download them now as this will be your last year to download those PS3 or PS Vita classics. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.techradar.com/news/ps-minus-no-more-ps3-or-ps-vita-games-on-ps-plus-from-march-2019]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Hearthstone Ranked Play Restored[/color][/b] 
Many players had issues with the Hearthstone ranked system. Players would get an error connection informing them that they were not able to join an online match. Thankfully this was quickly fixed and to apologize, Blizzard is giving away free card packs to everyone. Community manager Aratil says that everyone will be getting, "three Kobolds and Catacombs card packs" this upcoming week. Keep a lookout as you will be receiving these cards via the gift option in the Blizzard client. In addition, Chinese players were ranking up far faster than others around the world. Instead of only earning one star, Chinese players were obtaining five. Changes are being implemented with the ladder reset. This is the age of competitive play for Hearthstone and you will need to prove that you are tough enough to climb the ranked ladder. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/hearthstone-ranked-play-has-been-disabled-seemingly-due-to-a-major-bug/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/q2F6BnS.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]My Hero Academia 3rd Anime Season's 2nd Promo Video Previews UVERworld's Theme[/color][/b] 
The third season for Boku Hero Academia will premiere this April 7. Websites like Crunchyroll and Funimation will be streaming the episodes every Saturday. All of the staff from the first and second season will also be working on the third. The story takes place during the forest school trip arc from the manga. More great news is the announcement of an upcoming My Hero Academia movie that will be released this summer. On the official manga website for My Hero Academia, the second preview was streamed and Blue Exorcist, The Heroic Legend of Arslan's opening theme song was used for the promotional video. Check out the awesome trailer [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JezE6iZUWxo]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-03-03/my-hero-academia-3rd-anime-season-2nd-promo-video-previews-uverworld-theme/.128511]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Virtual Youtuber Kizuna Ai Appointed Tourism Ambassador by JNTO[/color][/b] 
The famous virtual YouTuber, Ai Kizuna, was recently appointed as an ambassador for the Japan National Tourism Organization. Known for her smug, sassy faces and funny videos she now encourages you to come visit Japan. Videos were made with her AI design to inform and educate tourists about Japan and hopefully enlighten you to visit. A special event is currently going on. Answer questions on a quiz which you can find [url=http://us.jnto.go.jp/cometojapan/]here[/url]. If enter you have the chance to win prizes including a trip to Japan. To watch the first promotional video you can see Ai [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kh3onXAPvco]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.crunchyroll.com/anime-news/2018/03/03-1/virtual-youtuber-kizuna-ai-appointed-tourism-ambassador-by-jnto]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: RE: Hack Forums News // Edition 381
